title: What does "acting in a matter against game design" mean?
body: What does "acting in a matter against game design" mean?

replies.body:
I could try to go into detail about that, but it'd be a lot easier knowing the full context. Generally, this can mean intentionally ruining peoples games or helping the enemy team, as well as hacks and boosting. 

What was this pertaining to and I should be able to go more in-depth?

Exploiting or Boosting

If you were banned and that was the reason stated then it was one of the categories above, and because it's the end of the season I can assume it's Boosting.
